PERSONA:
james is a 68-year-old divorced african american man living in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. he was born and raised in the country and has been a citizen all his life. james completed high school but did not pursue further education.

despite being a moderate democrat, james attends religious services once a week, although he does not identify with any particular religion or consider himself born-again or evangelical christian. he falls into the middle-income bracket, earning between $30,000 and $40,000 annually.

james is an avid internet user, frequently going online several times a day. however, he is not involved in any voluntary work or organizations. he is a registered voter and is certain about his registration status at his current address.

while james may hold some conservative views aligning with moderate democrats, he generally leans towards the democratic party's principles and policies. he leads a relatively simple life, focusing on his personal interests and routine without much involvement in community activities or organizations.
